oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of C. A. Hammond
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cabinet card of C. A. Hammond, Co. G, 1st U. S. Engineers. Hammond was from Hanover, Illinois. The words, "Rough & Ready" are written under the image on the front. Engineer regiments (often opearting as independent battalions or companies) constructed; fortifications, laid out earthworks, built roads, constructed bridges, and installed pontoon bridges.
